title: mocayyyyy
author: mocayyyyy
content: Trading cryptocurrency is just like gambling, except there is a skill element when it comes to trading. Top traders analyze the risk and reward ratio along with the harness techniques which have been practised and learned for increasing their chances of earning profit. So, trading cryptocurrency is just like poker but with an element of luck and skill mix. Which is similar to the strategies in Poker. Share you strategies in both poker and cryptocurrencies!!

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I have been playing online poker for many years now. In the past, I’ve made some good money and I used to get a real thrill from the game but less and less these days. The reality is, the older I get I’ve just come to the realization that I can’t win because there are professionals playing and it’s not an even playing field. For example, it’s kind of like if I jumped into a professional basketball game. Sure the rules are the same but I’m playing against people over a foot taller than I am. At the end of the day, I like a fair game too much and I don’t feel it’s an even playing field anymore.
